info.name: Honeycomb V3PO RESTCONF calls
info.description: Common mgmt operations on VPP core using Honeycomb REST interface

request.description: create loop interface
delete loop interface intfc loop1

Creates bridgfe domain. Corresponds to invoking:

vat#  bridge_domain_add_del bd_id [bd_id] learn 0 forward 0 uu-flood 0 flood 1 arp-term 0

To verify run:

vppctl show bridge-domain [bd_id] detail
Shows testBD bridge domain configuration.

Shows testBD bridge domain operational state.
Corresponds to invoking:

vppctl show bridge-domain [bd_id] detail

Adds l2 interconnection of bridge-based type to local0 interface.
Corresponds to the following command:

vppctl set interface l2 bridge local0 [bd_id]

To verify invoke:

vppctl show bridge-domain [bd_id] detail
Shows local0 interface configuration
Shows local0 interface operational state

Adds L2 FIB static entry. Corresponds to invoking:

vppctl l2fib add aa:bb:cc:dd:ee:ff [bd_id] local0

To verify run:

vppctl show l2fib verbose

Removes L2 FIB entry. Corresponds to invoking:

vppctl l2fib del aa:bb:cc:dd:ee:ff [bd_id]

To verify run:

vppctl show l2fib verbose

Adds L2 FIB static entry. Corresponds to invoking:

vppctl l2fib add 11:22:33:44:55:66 [bd_id] local0 static

To verify run:

vppctl show l2fib verbose

Adds L2 FIB static entry. Corresponds to invoking:

vppctl l2fib add 00:01:02:03:04:05 [bd_id] filter

To verify run:

vppctl show l2fib verbose

Removes l2 interconnection of bridge-based type from local0 interface.
Corresponds to the following VAT command:

vat# sw_interface_set_l2_bridge sw_if_index 0 bd_id 1 disable

Verification in VAT:

vat# bridge_domain_dump

Adds ARP termination termination entry. Corresponds to invoking:

vat# bd_ip_mac_add_del bd_id [bd_id] 1.2.3.4 aa:bb:cc:dd:ee:ff

To verify run:

vppctl show bridge-domain 1 detail

Removes ARP termination termination entry. Corresponds to invoking:

vat# bd_ip_mac_add_del bd_id [bd_id] 1.2.3.4 aa:bb:cc:dd:ee:ff del

To verify run:

vppctl show bridge-domain 1 detail
List mapping context stored in context datastore
List disabled interfaces (e.g. deleted vxlan tunnels)
List mapping context for ACLs stored in context datastore

item.name: ETH

request.description: Shows configuration for GigabitEthernet0/8/0
Shows operational state for GigabitEthernet0/8/0

item.description: Example requests for management of Ethernet type interfaces

request.description: This call returns data stored in honeycomb,to verify actual data stored by vpp, call vppctl show ip fib|arp

This call doesnt have respective dump call,because of performance issues(dump for this can contain millions of entries). Data inserted throught this call can be verified by calling vppctl show ip fib|arp
Verify this call by invoking vppctl show ip fib|arp

item.name: Remove ipv4 from local0 interface - cfg
Set ipv4 local0 interface - cfg netmask

request.description:
Correponds to the following command:

vppctl set interface ip address GigabitEthernet0/9/0.1 1.2.3.4/8

To verify invoke:
vppctl show int

Make local0 borrow ip from GigabiteEthernet0/8/0.
Equivalent of

set interface unnumbered local0 use GigabitEthernet0/8/0

Can be verified with

vppctl show interface address
set span src local0 dst GigabiteEthernet0/8/0
show span

When adding Tap to a bridge it is needed that the bridge exists. You can create it with these commands:

sudo brctl addbr testBridge
sudo brctl stp   testBridge off
sudo ip link set dev testBridge up

Adds vhost-user interface.
Corresponsing vpp cli command:

create vhost-user socket /tmp/soc1 server

To verify invoke:

vppctl show vhost-user

or

vppctl show int

Modifies vhost-user interface socket.
To verify invoke:

vppctl show vhost-user

Deletes vhost user interface.
Corresponding vpp CLI command:

vppctl delete vhost-user sw_if_index [index]

To verify invoke:

vppctl show vhost-user

or

vppctl show int

Adds sub interface. Corresponsing vpp cli command:

vppctl create sub GigabitEthernet0/9/0 1 dot1q 100 inner-dot1q any

To verify run:
./build-root/install-vpp-native/vpp-api-test/bin/vpp_api_test json
and invoke:

#vat sw_interface_dump

Enables GigabitEthernet0/9/0 interface. Equivalent vppctl command:

vppctl set in state GigabitEthernet0/9/0 up

Needed to enable sub interface.

To verify invoke:

vppctl show int

Enables GigabitEthernet0/9/0.1 sub interface. Equivalent vppctl command:

vppctl set in state GigabitEthernet0/9/0.1 up

To enable sub interface, super interface should be enabled first.

To verify invoke:

vppctl show int

Adds sub interface to bridge domain. Corresponsing vpp cli command:

vppctl set interface l2 bridge GigabitEthernet0/9/0.1 1 1

To verify invoke:
vppctl show bridge-domain 1 detail

Enables tag-rewrite push operation for GigabitEthernet0/9/0.1 sub-interface. Corresponsing vpp cli command:

vppctl set interface l2 tag-rewrite GigabitEthernet0/9/0.1 push dot1q 123 456

To verify run:
./build-root/install-vpp-native/vpp-api-test/bin/vpp_api_test json
and invoke:

#vat sw_interface_dump

or if sub-interface was added to bridge domain:

vppctl show bridge-domain [bd_id] detail

Enables tag-rewrite pop 1 operation for GigabitEthernet0/9/0.1 sub-interface. Corresponsing vpp cli command:

vppctl set interface l2 tag-rewrite GigabitEthernet0/9/0.1 pop 1

To verify run:
./build-root/install-vpp-native/vpp-api-test/bin/vpp_api_test json
and invoke:

#vat sw_interface_dump

or if sub-interface was added to bridge domain:

vppctl show bridge-domain [bd_id] detail

Enables tag-rewrite translate 1-2 operation for GigabitEthernet0/9/0.1 sub-interface. Corresponsing vpp cli command:

vppctl set interface l2 tag-rewrite GigabitEthernet0/9/0.1 translate 1-2 dot1q 111 222

To verify run:
./build-root/install-vpp-native/vpp-api-test/bin/vpp_api_test json
and invoke:

#vat sw_interface_dump

or if sub-interface was added to bridge domain:

vppctl show bridge-domain [bd_id] detail

Disables tag-rewrite operation for GigabitEthernet0/9/0.1 sub-interface. Corresponsing vpp cli command:

vppctl set interface l2 tag-rewrite GigabitEthernet0/9/0.1 disable

To verify run:
./build-root/install-vpp-native/vpp-api-test/bin/vpp_api_test json
and invoke:

#vat sw_interface_dump

or if sub-interface was added to bridge domain:

vppctl show bridge-domain [bd_id] detail

Creates host (af_packet) interface in VPP.
Requires creating veth pair in the linux first:

sudo ip link add veth0 type veth peer name veth1

Corresponds to following CLI command:

vppctl create host-interface name veth0

More info:
https://wiki.fd.io/view/VPP/Tutorial_Routing_and_Switching#Virtual_Network_Setup

Updates mac address of af_packet interface.

Since VPP does not support ad-packet update,
the request is internally translated into delete + create.

Deletes host (af_packet) interface in VPP.

Corresponds to following CLI command:

vppctl delete host-interface name veth0
List ifcs - cfg

item.name: Set vrf id for local0 - cfg
